title: FA audit logs
body: FA audit logs let you track user activities related to sensitive customer data and changes in preferences that can modify the business logic.

title: Customer information logs
body: FA records logging in and out, opening windows, making selections on Overview, searches, report generations, PDF and XLS exports. Each audit trail entry includes details about the user, time, and screen, and information the user accessed or exported.

title: Changes in system preferences
body: FA tracks changes in system preferences that can affect the business logic, such as modifications of security types, posting rules or account sets.

title: Changes in system preferences
body: Action Message Attachment

title: Changes in system preferences
body: Account set changes in Preference → Bookkeeping → Account set User [username] created/modified/deleted account set [account set code] Changes in JSON format. In case of creating or deleting an account set, all account set attributes and accounts are listed. Modification shows the change, the old values, and the new ones.

title: Changes in system preferences
body: Analytics+ columns changes in Preference → Content and translations → Analytics+ columns User [username] changed Analytics+ custom column definition for [custom column code] Changes in JSON format. In case of creating or deleting a column, all column attributes are listed. Modification shows the change, the old values, and the new ones.

title: Changes in system preferences
body: Permissions changes: any time permission is changed in Preference → Administration → Permissions User [username] changed permissions: [permission change] Changes in JSON format: old permission set and the new one.

title: Changes in system preferences
body: Posting rule changes in Preferences → Bookkeeping → Posting rules User [username] created/modified/deleted posting rule in rule set [ruleset code] id [rule ID] Changes in JSON format. In case of creating or deleting a posting rule, all posting rule attributes are listed. Modification shows the change, the old values, and the new ones.

title: Changes in system preferences
body: Posting rule import in Preferences → Bookkeeping → Posting rules User [username] imported posting rules in rule set [rule set code] Changes in JSON format: all attributes of all rules in the imported file as one list.

title: Changes in system preferences
body: Security type changes in Preference → Securities → Security types User [username] created/modified/deleted security type [security type code] Changes in JSON format. In case of creating or deleting a security type, all security type attributes are listed. Modification shows the change, the old values, and the new ones.
